abstract: The announcement of a joint news conference to be held in London on Monday set off a torrent of speculation.
snippet: The announcement of a joint news conference to be held in London on Monday set off a torrent of speculation.
lead_paragraph: PARIS, April 1 — Relations between Apple Inc. and the EMI Group, once at odds over the trademark rights to the Apple name, the record label of the Beatles, seem to be getting better all the time.

headline.main: Speculation Is in the Air Over EMI and Apple
headline.print_headline: Speculation Is in the Air Over EMI And Apple
